trans-unit.source: Extend the ExceptionHandler class to create an exception handler for unhandled exceptions that occur within the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] runtime.
trans-unit.target: Utvide ExceptionHandler klassen for å opprette en unntak behandlingsprogram for et ubehandlet unntak som forekommer innenfor den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kjøring.

trans-unit.source: Extend the ExceptionHandler class and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A> method to determine whether an exception should terminate the application.
trans-unit.target: Utvide klassen ExceptionHandler og overstyre den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A>metode for å finne ut om et unntak må avslutte programmet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then create a new instance of your custom ExceptionHandler class and assign it to the static <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.TransportExceptionHandler%2A> property prior to creating [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] clients or services.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en ny forekomst av den egendefinerte ExceptionHandler klassen og tilordne den til statiske <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler%2A>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.TransportExceptionHandler%2A>egenskapen før du oppretter [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] klienter eller tjenester.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.TransportExceptionHandler%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> that handles all exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Henter en forekomst av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> som behandler alle unntak.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> object that returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for all exceptions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> -objekt som returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> for alle unntak.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> implementation for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjeldende <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> implementering for programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: By default, the AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler property is `null`, and unhandled exceptions on asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] threads terminate the application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler er som standard `null`, og ubehandlet unntak i asynkrone [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråder avslutte programmet.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler> object to receive and react to these exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler>objektet til å motta og reagere på disse unntakene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler>

trans-unit.source: If an unhandled exception occurs on an asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread and reaches this handler, the state of the application domain may be compromised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i en asynkron [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråd og når dette behandlingsprogrammet, tilstanden til programdomenet bli skadet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A> should not return `true` for these exceptions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A>skal ikke returnere `true` for disse unntakene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Assign a custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur on asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] threads.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne en egendefinert <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> objektet som skal motta ubehandlet unntak som skjer på asynkrone [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråder.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception has been handled, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the exception should be rethrown and the application terminated.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis unntaket er behandlet, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis unntaket skal rethrown og programmet avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: The HandleException property returns `true` if the exception has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer HandleException `true` hvis unntaket er håndtert.

trans-unit.source: If it returns `false` or throws a different exception, the original exception is rethrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den returnerer `false` eller kaster en annen unntak, opprinnelige unntaket rethrown.

trans-unit.source: The exception the occurred within the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] runtime and which may terminate the application.
trans-unit.target: Unntak i oppstod i den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] runtime og som kan avslutte programmet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket er håndtert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current transport <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> implementation for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den gjeldende transporten <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> implementering for programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: By default, the TransportExceptionHandler property is set to the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.AlwaysHandle%2A>, causing unhandled exceptions within [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transports to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Som standard TransportExceptionHandler-egenskapen er satt til verdien for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.AlwaysHandle%2A>, fører til at et ubehandlet unntak i [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transport skal ignoreres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.AlwaysHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this property to an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler> to receive and react to these exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen til en forekomst av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler>å motta og reagere på disse unntakene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler>

trans-unit.source: If an unhandled exception occurs within a global [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transport and reaches this handler, there is a possibility that the state of the application domain is compromised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i en global [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Transportregler og kommer dette behandlingsprogrammet er en mulig at tilstanden til programdomenet er utsatt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A> can return `false` for these exceptions to cause the application to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A>kan returnere `false` for disse unntakene vil føre til at programmet avsluttes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler.HandleException%2A>

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"></xref> object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur within the global [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transports.
trans-unit.target: En egendefinert <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ExceptionHandler"> </xref> objektet som skal motta ubehandlet unntak som forekommer innenfor den globale [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transport.
